Entries.48450001/e 639373/t 600 1130: echos/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Lewis 63 18 0 Marnie 63 18 0/skippable/move Marnie 1 0 0/pause 2000/speak Lewis "... Hi, @. Good morning.#$b#I think we'd ought to talk.$5"/pause 200/faceDirection Marnie 3/faceDirection Lewis 1/pause 1800/faceDirection Lewis 2/pause 500/showFrame Lewis 27/pause 800/showFrame Lewis 18/pause 1200/speak Lewis "I've been an old fool.$s"/pause 1500/faceDirection Lewis 1/faceDirection Lewis 0/faceDirection Marnie 0/speak Marnie "@, we stayed up all night talking about the conversation you overheard last night.#$b#We think...$3"/pause 300/speak Lewis "We're going to tell the town about us.#$b#We'll let the villagers decide whether they'd still like me to be their mayor.#$b#But I'm tired of hiding our happiness!$h"/pause 1000/showFrame Lewis 29/showFrame Marnie 36/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.Town6: Thank you, @, for encouraging us to tell the town about our love.#$b#I've never been so happy!$h
I'm so glad we finally told the town about our relationship.#$b#Everyone has been so lovely!$h#$b#And it's all thanks to you.
